rmA.dsc: <p><strong>1 Double Bed</strong></p><p>151-sq-foot room with city views </p><br/><p><b>Relax</b> - Fireplace</p><p><b>Internet</b> - Free WiFi and wired Internet access</p><p><b>Entertainment</b> - LCD television with premium channels</p><p><b>Food & Drink</b> - Refrigerator, minibar, coffee/tea maker, and 24-hour room service</p><p><b>Sleep</b> - Premium bedding </p><p><b>Bathroom</b> - Private bathroom, shower/tub combination, free toiletries, and a hair dryer (on request)</p><p><b>Practical</b> - Safe, free newspaper, and iron/ironing board; rollaway/extra beds available on request</p><p><b>Comfort</b> - Air conditioning</p><p><b>Accessibility</b> - Raised toilet seat, wheelchair accessible, low-height counter and sink, and bathroom emergency pull cord</p><p>Non-Smoking</p>

xpDtlA: If you cancel your booking before 03 Aug, you'll get a full refund
If you cancel your booking after 03 Aug, 1 night charges will be deducted as cancellation fee
On no-show, there will be no refund.
roptA.name: Deluxe Room
key: Free valet parking, Free self parking, Free WiFi
